trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_SEQ_00<tab>A scout of the Wing of Protection is on the lookout for a likely adventurer.

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_MAMOOLJA05009_000_001<tab>You there. You are <var 29 EB02 /var>, are you not? The adventurer from across the water who has been lending the Third Promise <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> strength?

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_MAMOOLJA05009_000_002<tab>You there. You are <var 29 EB02 /var>, are you not? The adventurer from across the water who has been lending the Dawnservant <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> strength?
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_MAMOOLJA05009_000_003<tab>Then well met! To tell the truth, I have been meaning to make your acquaintance for some time. I have a proposition for you.

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_MAMOOLJA05009_000_004<tab>You are familiar with the Eorzean hunts, yes? We have something very similar here in Tuliyollal─and, having heard much of your philanthropic spirit, not to mention your capacity for violence, we should very much like to recruit you to our cause.

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_MAMOOLJA05009_000_005<tab>If you are interested, speak with my associate, Bol Ogaw. The Xbr'aal is a master of the hunt, and administers to the bills in the square overlooking the port. Tell him the Wing of Protection recommends you.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_011<tab>Hmm... Your posture could use some work, but you've got good eyes. Eyes that have seen a few things. You here to sign up?

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_012<tab>...Heh! The Wing of Protection recommend you, do they? Well, we're always on the lookout for new hunters, and if you're good enough for Wuk Lamat, you're good enough for us.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_013<tab>Pleasure to have you with us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Suppose I better get down to the introductions.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_014<tab>Or maybe I don't need to? This whole idea came from your side of the sea, after all. It was Koana who showed us your ways.

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_015<tab>Either way, I'll keep it brief. Our hunts work much the same way they do in Eorzea. We put a bounty on those beasts that prove themselves an enemy of the people. You kill them and bring us back the proof, you get your reward.

TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_016<tab>While your reputation may precede you, rules are rules─and the rule is I have to test every hopeful out on beginner bills. Can't have every youngling with nothing to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> name but a plowshare and a dream of glory skipping merrily away to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> doom.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_BOLOGAW_000_017<tab>Prove yourself in Tural and I'll give you some bigger, bitier fish to fry!
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_SYSTEM_000_018<tab>You are now able to undertake beginner Dawn Hunt mark bills from the Dawn Hunt board in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>Defeat the monsters described on the bills and you will be rewarded with tokens that can be exchanged for exclusive items.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>To exchange tokens for exclusive items, speak with Ryubool Ja in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGYR201_05009_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>New quests and intermediate Dawn Hunt mark bills will become available from Bol Ogaw upon reaching level 94.
